links.title: United Parcel Service (UPS) Stake Upped by Prentiss Smith & Co Inc; Bingham Osborn & Scarborough Has Raised Apple (AAPL) Position | The Cardinal Weekly
links.description: Prentiss Smith & Co Inc increased its stake in United Parcel Service Inc (UPS) by 1965.11% based on its latest 2018Q1 regulatory filing with the SEC. Prentiss Smith & Co Inc bought 61,626 shares as the company's stock rose 6.87% while stock markets declined.

links.title: Washington Trust Bank Lifted Its Apple (AAPL) Position; Broadcom Inc. (AVGO) Had 28 Bullish Analysts | The Toko Yuri
links.description: Among 37 analysts covering Broadcom Ltd (NASDAQ:AVGO), 28 have Buy rating, 0 Sell and 9 Hold. Therefore 76% are positive. Broadcom Ltd has $350 highest and $220 lowest target. $301.83's average target is 36.54% above currents $221.05 stock price. Broadcom Ltd had 64 analyst reports since January 31, 2018 according to SRatingsIntel.

messages.body: $AAPL https://hillaryhq.com/2018/07/28/beacon-financial-group-has-raised-its-apple-aapl-holding-blackrock-strategic-municipal-trust-bsds-sentiment-is-4-25/

links.title: Beacon Financial Group Has Raised Its Apple (AAPL) Holding; Blackrock Strategic Municipal Trust (BSD)'s Sentiment Is 4.25 | The Hillary HQ
links.description: Blackrock Strategic Municipal Trust (BSD) investors sentiment increased to 4.25 in Q1 2018. It's up 2.92, from 1.33 in 2017Q4. The ratio is better, as 17 funds increased or opened new stock positions, while 4 trimmed and sold equity positions in Blackrock Strategic Municipal Trust.

messages.body:
$AAPL Has Apple Lost its Cool Factor? It Might Not Matter

https://www.thestreet.com/technology/has-apple-lost-its-cool-factor-14664428

links.title: Has Apple lost its cool factor? It might not matter
links.description: Once upon a time, an iPhone was the most sought-after fashion accessory of every cool kid on the block. That's the longstanding cliché about Apple ( AAPL) fans, at least, and one that's paid off handsomely for Apple and its shareholders. Apple sold 216.76 million iPhones last year.

messages.body:
Earnings Roundup: Facebook, Amazon, Twitter and What to Expect From Apple

$AAPL $TWTR $FB $AMZN  

https://www.thestreet.com/video/earnings-roundup-facebook-amazon-twitter-and-what-to-expect-from-apple-14665220

links.title: Earnings Roundup: Facebook, Amazon, Twitter and What to Expect From Apple
links.description: Tech earnings were in focus this week amid disappointing earnings from Facebook ( FB) and Twitter ( TWTR) and blowout results from Amazon ( AMZN) . Facebook wiped away all of its 2018 gains following lackluster results released on Wednesday. The stock remains in negative territory for 2018.

links.title: Apple and Tesla Earnings Take Center Stage: The Week Ahead
links.description: Time to put aside (briefly) that disastrous Facebook ( FB) second quarter earnings call. Here's what is on tap in the week ahead. Apple Inc. ( AAPL) is slated to release its earnings after the bell on Tuesday. According to FactSet, analysts believe that the company will announce earnings of $2.16 a share.
